name: Bigodino.it
overview:
Bigodino.it is a women online magazine. Bigodino.it is a supplement of Multiplayer.it which, together with Movieplayer.it, are registered trademarks of NetAddistion Ltd.

Bigodino.it was launched in October 2011 as a “work in progress” project, with the aim to grow and develop over time according to the tastes and demands of its readers. Just a few months after its launch, Bigodino.it is an established editorial product with an active and growing community.

Bigodino.it is a web magazine dedicated to women, a blog that collects the 18 best and most successful Italian bloggers who were able to turn their passion in their job. Each of them deals with a specific aspect of women life and together they offer a complete editorial coverage in fashion, health and wellness, technology, travel, design, entertainment and food.

In February 2013, Bigodino.it opened the section “Blog”, a space dedicated to all the readers who want contribute to the website with their own content.

Bigodino.it offers to its readers a different point of view, it speaks the mind of real women with opinions, recommendations, personal experiences and a direct dialogue that brings readers and editors together. Every day, on Bogdino.it, the bloggers tell their experience and reviews on flea market, weekends of sport and travel, handmade jewelry , haute couture and low cost clothing, DIY make up and much more.

Bigodino.it also offers a wide section of advice and services, with experts answering questions about wellness and nutrition, a “fashion map” to find shops, markets and fairs around Italy , a “Bigobook” where readers can upload and download their favourite outfits and “Bigogram”, which allows users to view the photos posted on Instagram with the tag Bigodino.it.
